name: Lu Lu
description:
Lu Lu is a 3d platformer horror game exploring the twisted second life of your daughters favourite doll....

This game was made in under 5 days for a GameJam where the theme was you only get one.

Attributions:

All 2d art by Courtney Tanfield

All programming by Jamie Hulkes

Some 3d assets by Jamie Hulkes

Some 3d assets by SynthyStudios

Music by Myuu and Kim Lightyear
